meanings.definition: A fellow member of a profession or organization.
meanings.sent1: My confrere in the accounting department helped me with the budget report.
meanings.sent2: She discussed the project with her confrere before the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The confrere from the legal team made a joke about spreadsheets.
meanings.sent4: The confrere's support was a pillar of strength during the challenging project.
meanings.sent5: I always rely on my confrere for valuable advice and guidance.
